desc: Fine-Art Photography, Large Acrylic Prints, Photo Adventures

layout.text:
Affinity Studio is the print production home of professional nature and wilderness photographer Jackson Ball.  Jackson specializes in extra-ordinary large acrylic prints from his highly specialized medium format and high-resolution technical cameras with Leica and Rodenstock lenses.
The result is fine-art prints that are simply stunning with fine detail and rich natural color. 
It really is breathtaking - like being there.
